projects.title: Heyo!
projects.description: A full-stack web application that allows users to post their thoughts. Used Firebase authentication for login and account registration. Stored posts and comments as JSON data in the Firebase realtime database. Enabled users to post pictures, stored as Blobs in Cloud Firestore. Built front-end using Material UI.

projects.title: Course Buddy
projects.description: Developed a web application for Computer Science Students in the University of Waterloo to help with course selection. Included a drag-and-drop API to allow students to drag courses into their schedule and to enhance the aesthetics of the web page. Stored user authentication information and course selections in Firebase realtime database. Built front-end using Material UI.

projects.title: Pong Simulator
projects.description: Created a singleplayer 3D table tennis game with the Unity3D game engine. Implemented a points system, ball respawning mechanism, pause-and-play system, and introduction screen using C#.
